name: What's Your Gender?
description:
The original release of “What's your gender” was our entry and the winner to the “Binary and Beyond” themed BPB game jam. Since then a couple of updates have added content, english language support and rounded out the game. Additionally the Steam release has a couple of achievements to hunt.

It is an Antichamber inspired educational puzzle game, that allows you to simultaneously explore a non-euclidean maze and concepts and terms related to gender, identity and expression in a playful and reassuring manner. The game is currently available fully voiced in English and German.

NOTE: This is a short game.

Controls


  • WASD or Arrow keys + Mouse to move
  • Space to jump (optional)
  • E/LMB to interact
